org.chronos.chronodb.internal.api.cache

Interface ChronoDBCache.CacheStatistics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheStatisticsImpl
    Enclosing interface:
    ChronoDBCache

    public static interface ChronoDBCache.CacheStatistics
    This interface describes a set of statistics that can be retrieved about a ChronoDBCache.

    Use ChronoDBCache.getStatistics() to retrieve an instance of this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCacheHitCount()
      Returns the number of cache hits recorded in this cache.
      default double getCacheHitRatio()
      Returns the cache hit ratio.
      long getCacheMissCount()
      Returns the number of cache misses recorded in this cache.
      default double getCacheMissRatio()
      Returns the cache miss ratio.
      default long getRequestCount()
      Returns the request count, i.e. the number of ChronoDBCache.get(String, long, QualifiedKey) calls received by this cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getCacheHitCount

        long getCacheHitCount()
        Returns the number of cache hits recorded in this cache.

        A cache hit is a request to ChronoDBCache.get(String, long, QualifiedKey) that returns a result that represents a hit.

        Returns:
        The number of cache hits. Never negative, may be zero.

      • getCacheMissCount

        long getCacheMissCount()
        Returns the number of cache misses recorded in this cache.

        A cache miss is a request to ChronoDBCache.get(String, long, QualifiedKey) that returns a result that represents a miss.

        Returns:
        The number of cache misses. Never negative, may be zero.

      • getRequestCount

        default long getRequestCount()
        Returns the request count, i.e. the number of ChronoDBCache.get(String, long, QualifiedKey) calls received by this cache.
        Returns:
        The request count. May be zero, but never negative.

      • getCacheHitRatio

        default double getCacheHitRatio()
        Returns the cache hit ratio.

        The cache hit ratio is the getCacheHitCount() divided by the getRequestCount().

        The sum of the hit ratio and the miss ratio is always equal to 1 (modulo precision errors), except when the request count is zero.

        Returns:
        The cache hit count. Will be NaN if the request count is zero.

      • getCacheMissRatio

        default double getCacheMissRatio()
        Returns the cache miss ratio.

        The cache miss ratio is the getCacheMissCount() divided by the getRequestCount().

        The sum of the hit ratio and the miss ratio is always equal to 1 (modulo precision errors), except when the request count is zero.

        Returns:
        The cache miss count. Will be NaN if the request count is zero.
